NeedDef.label: worship
NeedDef.description: Worship represents how much someone has worshipped their deity. If a god-fearing person goes for too long without worshipping, they will suffer a mood penalty. Additionally, certain rituals are only available if all members of the ideoligion are above a certain worship threshold.

NeedDef.label: sacrifice
NeedDef.description: Sacrifice represents the need for a person to make sacrifices to appease their deity. These sacrifices can range in form from ritual animal slaughter to blood-sport duels in the name of a higher power.
